Thanks smiley I got the power iso 4.7 from pirate bay and used it to extract the file. Copy and paste the iso file into power iso. Dont hit the extract button at the top, just dbl click on the file, it will recommend moving to a temp file, say yes. This will open the pages with instructions, serials, and exe's. Follow smileys directions from here. I did not have to select x64, it did all that automatically. Seems to work well on my win7 x64 machine...  awesome!

Ok so I am going to help you guys out with installing this as some people seem to be iffy about it. I just installed it and its fully activated and working great!

1. download the torrent and then save it to safe location on your computer

2. Burn to an DVD or download a program called slysoft clone drive(This is freeware and creates a virtual drive for the iso)

3.Your computer should pop up with seteup.exe Click it to run the set up.

4. Go back to the iso on your computer while leaving the serials screen up and right click and open archive with 7 zip to view the serials file in the iso. Its labled serials and has all the install instructions in the iso as well.

5. Copy the serial into the serials screen and continue with the install. 

6. You don't have to have an adobe id on the left bottom corner it says skip this step.

7. Once it is finished do not run any adobe programs yet. The host file must be changed but there is a program in iso already that will do it for you.

8. Open the iso back up and right above the serials file should be an activation application. Open it and run it.

9. Follow the on screen instructions. . . .Just hit any button until the screen goes away.

10. Enjoy Adobe cs5 Master Collection! It is now fully installed to your computer and fully registered as well! I will vouche that this does indeed work as I am using it now. 

DON'T FORGET TO SEED WHEN YOU ARE DONE DOWNLOADING THE FILE! :)

Forgot to mention to get slysoft's clone drive to open the iso as a virtual cd, just go to the iso and right click it. You will see mount virtual drive as an option. Click that and then you will receive the pop up showing the setup.exe

CharcoalKiss: I can't comment for this torrent in particular, as I haven't downloaded it yet, but many activators and crack patches will show as false positives on antivirus scanners.

What an activator does is similar to what a virus can do, so the code shows a positive to the AV, but it's really harmless.
did some1 manage to install this?

THANK YOU, Thank You, Thank you!! This one worked for me on a  windows 7 64 machine as slick as could be! 
 I had tried another of this type download and it never fully worked, only some of the programs would open. Made me crazy, even re-installed Windows 7 OS.
 This torrent and crack will work if you follow directions! I fully uninstalled the full CS5 ME  and ran the adobe cleaner tool first, then rebooted and turned off both the internet connection and my AV software first though.  
FYI, Adobe offers a CS5 uninstall clean up tool that is free and cleans all the registry entries from previous installs! 
http://kb2.adobe.com/cps/829/cpsid_82947.html
